statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP'
SELECT source_ip, bytes_sent FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE destination_ip = '192.168.1.1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT destination_ip, SUM(bytes_sent) AS total_bytes_sent FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY destination_ip
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip HAVING total_logs > 10
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, bytes_sent FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE bytes_sent > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, port FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'TCP' AND port BETWEEN 80 AND 443 ORDER BY port ASC
SELECT destination_ip, bytes_sent FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY bytes_sent DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, bytes_sent FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol IN ('UDP','TCP') ORDER BY bytes_sent ASC
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip LIKE '192.%' AND destination_ip LIKE '%.168' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, port FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP'
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT * FROM anomaly_logs WHERE anomaly_type = 'DDoS'
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, port, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol IN ('TCP', 'UDP') AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, port, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE destination_ip = '10.0.0.1' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, anomaly_type, timestamp FROM anomaly_logs WHERE anomaly_type LIKE '%malware%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, port, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND port = 80 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, SUM(bytes_sent) AS total_bytes_sent FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip;
SELECT t.analysis_id, t.analysis_result, a.description FROM traffic_analysis t JOIN anomalies a ON t.log_id = a.log_id;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE bytes_sent > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_logs DESC
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND destination_ip LIKE '192.168.%'
SELECT * FROM traffic_analysis JOIN network_traffic_logs ON traffic_analysis.log_id = network_traffic_logs.log_id WHERE DATE(timestamp) = '2022-01-15'
SELECT destination_ip, SUM(bytes_sent) AS total_bytes_sent FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY destination_ip HAVING total_bytes_sent > 5000 ORDER BY total_bytes_sent DESC
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT rule_name, rule_condition, rule_action FROM anomaly_detection_rules WHERE rule_action = 'alert' ORDER BY rule_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, analysis_timestamp, analysis_result FROM traffic_analysis_results WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%anomaly%';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'TCP' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router'
SELECT rule_name, rule_condition, rule_action FROM anomaly_detection_rules
SELECT * FROM traffic_analysis_results WHERE analysis_timestamp > '2023-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY analysis_timestamp
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, bytes_sent FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'TCP'
SELECT destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE bytes_sent > 100000
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection WHERE detected_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE bytes_sent > 100000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT DISTINCT protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.0.1' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'

SELECT log.id, log.source_ip, anomaly_type, detected_at, result FROM network_traffic_logs AS log JOIN analysis_results AS res ON log.id = res.log_id WHERE res.analysis_type = 'network_anomaly' ORDER BY detected_at DESC
SELECT u.username, u.email, u.role, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM users AS u JOIN network_traffic_logs AS log ON u.id = log.id GROUP BY u.id HAVING total_logs > 5 ORDER BY total_logs DESC
